definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Currently, the development of wind energy resources in Dongying City is mainly embodied in wind power generation.
sentences.chinese: 目前東營市風能資源的發展主要體現在風力發電上。

sentences.english: 3 applies to solar and wind-powered lighting.
sentences.chinese: 應用於太陽能和風能供電照明。

sentences.english: Wind power from the North Sea and the Atlantic Ocean will require that.
sentences.chinese: 來自北海及大西洋充足的風能需要人們架線傳輸。

sentences.english: The intermittency of wind power does mean that we would need to run our electricity grids in a very different way.
sentences.chinese: 風能中斷需要我們用不同的方法運行電網。

sentences.english: But most of this energy is at high altitude.
sentences.chinese: 然而，大部分風能潛藏在高海拔區域。

sentences.english: Steel plate integral punching produced , high precision , strong ability of anti-wind .
sentences.chinese: 鋼板整體衝制，精度高，抗風能力強。

sentences.english: Air infiltration energy consumption of tall building has become a serious problem in HVAC.
sentences.chinese: 高層建築滲風能耗已成爲暖通專業中不容忽視的問題。

sentences.english: High winds on the eastern coast is prime for on and off-shore wind farms.
sentences.chinese: 東部沿海的風能資源是陸上和海上風電場的首選。

sentences.english: Oak is a sun-loving plant and has deep roots, which can bear strong wind.
sentences.chinese: 麻櫟是喜光樹種，深根性，抗風能力強。

sentences.english: The Energy Roof is self-sufficient and is powered by both the wind and the sun.
sentences.chinese: 能量屋頂由風能和太陽能驅動，能做到自給自足。

sentences.english: "Wind and solar are very complementary," Jacobson says.
sentences.chinese: “風能和太陽能有很強的互補性，”雅格布森說。
很明顯，里根看不起風能。

sentences.english: On that score, high-altitude wind looks very promising.
sentences.chinese: 在這方面，高空風能看來非常有前途。

sentences.english: Use of wind power is on the rise, Sawyer said.
sentences.chinese: 索耶說，風能正得到日益廣泛的應用。

sentences.english: But our wind “road-to-market” is becoming clogged.
sentences.chinese: 然而風能‘通向市場之路’被堵塞。

sentences.english: That’s more than double EIA’s estimate of the total system levelized cost of wind, and almost four times the cost of conventional coal.
sentences.chinese: 那是風能平準化成本的兩倍，燃煤發電的四倍。

definition: the China Seas (the seas of the Western Pacific Ocean, around China: Bohai Sea, Yellow Sea, East China Sea, South China Sea)
interregional/spanning two or more PRC provinces
